text: Marinus Johannes Christiaan "Joop" Worrell (18 June 1938 â€“ 17 January 2022) was a Dutch politician of the Labour Party. He served as a alderman of Woudrichem from 1971 to 1974 and as a member of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands from 1974 to 1989. Afterwards he became mayor of Woudrichem between 1989 and 2001. Worrell died in Woudrichem on 17 January 2022, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Amsterdam Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Dutch mayors
title: Joop Worrell
